001package edu.cnm.deepdive.appstarter.model;
002
003
004import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
005import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
006import com.jsyn.JSyn;
007import com.jsyn.Synthesizer;
008import com.jsyn.devices.AndroidAudioForJSyn;
009import com.jsyn.devices.AudioDeviceManager;
010import com.jsyn.unitgen.FilterLowPass;
011import com.jsyn.unitgen.LineOut;
012import com.jsyn.unitgen.LinearRamp;
013import com.jsyn.unitgen.PinkNoise;
014import com.jsyn.unitgen.UnitOscillator;
015
016public class Swarm {
017
018  private String swarmName = "Current Swarm"; // Name of the current swarm specified by default or from user created preset
019  private float busFilter; // Value to be passed the LowPass Filter in the JSyn Synthesizer
020  private float pinknoiselevel;
021  private float centerPitch; // Value from which the array of spread pitches will be extrapolated
022  private float currentspreadrange;// Store the current spreadrange applied to the Spread() method, to pass to Database
023  private float waveformselection; // Between 1 -4, Choice of Sine, Square, Saw, or Triangle Oscillator
024  private float[] spreadPitches = {centerPitch, centerPitch, centerPitch, centerPitch, centerPitch,
025      centerPitch, centerPitch, centerPitch};// Frequencies to be distributed tot he cluster of Oscillator Objects
026  private float dronePitch;// Frequency of the Pedal Tone.
027  private Oscillator[] swarmoscillators; // Array to contain the 8 Oscillator instances that comprise the Swarm.
028
029  private Oscillator droneOscillator; // A Single Oscillator Instance to be used as a seperate pedal tone
030  private AudioDeviceManager manager = new AndroidAudioForJSyn(); //Android Audio Manager to handle Output from Jsyn
031  private Synthesizer swarmatron; // Jsyn Synthesizer Object
032  private final FilterLowPass cutoff;
033  private final PinkNoise pinknoise;
034  private final LineOut mLineOut; // JSyn Output for the constituents of the Synthesizer object
035
036
037  private final LinearRamp mAmpJack; // Not quite sure what this does yet.
038
039
040  public Swarm(float waveformselection) {
041
042this.waveformselection = waveformselection;
043pinknoise = new PinkNoise();
044
045    swarmoscillators = new Oscillator[]{new Oscillator(waveformselection), new Oscillator(waveformselection), new Oscillator(waveformselection),
046        new Oscillator(waveformselection), new Oscillator(waveformselection), new Oscillator(waveformselection), new Oscillator(waveformselection), new Oscillator(waveformselection)};
047    droneOscillator = new Oscillator(waveformselection);
048    swarmatron = JSyn.createSynthesizer(manager);
049    swarmatron.add(mLineOut = new LineOut());
050    swarmatron.add(mAmpJack = new LinearRamp());
051    swarmatron.add(cutoff = new FilterLowPass());
052    cutoff.frequency.set(1000);
053    pinknoise.amplitude.set(0);
054    swarmatron.add(swarmoscillators[0].getOscillator());
055    swarmatron.add(swarmoscillators[1].getOscillator());
056    swarmatron.add(swarmoscillators[2].getOscillator());
057    swarmatron.add(swarmoscillators[3].getOscillator());
058    swarmatron.add(swarmoscillators[4].getOscillator());
059    swarmatron.add(swarmoscillators[5].getOscillator());
060    swarmatron.add(swarmoscillators[6].getOscillator());
061    swarmatron.add(swarmoscillators[7].getOscillator());
062    swarmatron.add(pinknoise);
063
064    swarmoscillators[0].getOscillator().amplitude.set(0.01);
065    swarmoscillators[1].getOscillator().amplitude.set(0.01);
066    swarmoscillators[2].getOscillator().amplitude.set(0.01);
067    swarmoscillators[3].getOscillator().amplitude.set(0.01);
068    swarmoscillators[4].getOscillator().amplitude.set(0.01);
069    swarmoscillators[5].getOscillator().amplitude.set(0.01);
070    swarmoscillators[6].getOscillator().amplitude.set(0.01);
071    swarmoscillators[7].getOscillator().amplitude.set(0.01);
072    pinknoise.amplitude.set(0.00);
073
074    swarmoscillators[0].getOscillator().output.connect(0, cutoff.input, 0);
075    swarmoscillators[1].getOscillator().output.connect(0, cutoff.input, 0);
076    swarmoscillators[2].getOscillator().output.connect(0, cutoff.input, 0);
077    swarmoscillators[3].getOscillator().output.connect(0, cutoff.input, 0);
078    swarmoscillators[4].getOscillator().output.connect(0, cutoff.input, 0);
079    swarmoscillators[5].getOscillator().output.connect(0, cutoff.input, 0);
080    swarmoscillators[6].getOscillator().output.connect(0, cutoff.input, 0);
081    swarmoscillators[7].getOscillator().output.connect(0, cutoff.input, 0);
082    pinknoise.output.connect(0, cutoff.input, 0);
083    cutoff.output.connect(0, mLineOut.input, 0);
084
085
086
087
088  }
089
090
091
092  public void start() {
093    setOscillatorFrequency();
094    swarmatron.start();
095    mLineOut.start();
096
097
098  }
099  public void stop() {
100    swarmatron.stop();
101    mLineOut.stop();
102  }
103
104  public void setOscillatorFrequency() {
105    swarmoscillators[0].getOscillator().frequency.set(spreadPitches[0]);
106    swarmoscillators[1].getOscillator().frequency.set(spreadPitches[1]);
107    swarmoscillators[2].getOscillator().frequency.set(spreadPitches[2]);
108    swarmoscillators[3].getOscillator().frequency.set(spreadPitches[3]);
109    swarmoscillators[4].getOscillator().frequency.set(spreadPitches[4]);
110    swarmoscillators[5].getOscillator().frequency.set(spreadPitches[5]);
111    swarmoscillators[6].getOscillator().frequency.set(spreadPitches[6]);
112    swarmoscillators[7].getOscillator().frequency.set(spreadPitches[7]);
113    cutoff.frequency.set(busFilter);
114    pinknoise.amplitude.set(pinknoiselevel);
115
116  }
117
118  public void setCutoff(float cutoff) {
119    busFilter = cutoff;
120  }
121  public void setPinknoiselevel(float pinknoiselevel) {
122    this.pinknoiselevel = pinknoiselevel;
123  }
124
125  @Override
126  public int hashCode() {
127    return super.hashCode();
128  }
129
130  @Override
131  public boolean equals(@Nullable @org.jetbrains.annotations.Nullable Object obj) {
132    Swarm targetSwarm = (Swarm) obj;
133    if (this.centerPitch == targetSwarm.centerPitch && this.busFilter == targetSwarm.busFilter
134        && this.spreadPitches == targetSwarm.spreadPitches
135        && (this.hashCode() == targetSwarm.hashCode())) {
136      return true;
137    } else {
138      return false;
139    }
140  }
141
142
143  public float getBusFilter() {
144    return busFilter;
145  }
146
147  public void setBusFilter(float busFilter) {
148    this.busFilter = busFilter;
149  }
150
151  public String getSwarmName() {
152    return swarmName;
153  }
154
155  public void setSwarmName(String swarmName) {
156    this.swarmName = swarmName;
157  }
158
159  public float getCenterPitch() {
160    return centerPitch;
161  }
162
163  public void setCenterPitch(float centerPitch) {
164    this.centerPitch = centerPitch;
165  }
166
167  public float[] getSpreadPitches() {
168    return spreadPitches;
169  }
170
171  public void setSpreadPitches(float[] spreadPitches) {
172
173    this.spreadPitches = spreadPitches;
174  }
175
176  public float getDronePitch() {
177    return dronePitch;
178  }
179
180  public void setDronePitch(int dronePitch) {
181    this.dronePitch = dronePitch;
182  }
183
184  public Oscillator getDroneOscillator() {
185    return droneOscillator;
186  }
187
188  public void setDroneOscillator(Oscillator droneOscillator) {
189    this.droneOscillator = droneOscillator;
190  }
191
192  @NonNull
193  @Override
194  public String toString() {
195    return swarmName;
196  }
197
198  public float getWaveformSelection() {
199    return waveformselection;
200  }
201
202  public void setWaveformselection(float waveformselection) {
203    this.waveformselection = waveformselection;
204  }
205
206  public float getCurrentSpreadrange() {
207    return currentspreadrange;
208  }
209
210  public void setCurrentspreadrange(float currentspreadrange) {
211    this.currentspreadrange = currentspreadrange;
212  }
213
214  public float getPinknoiselevel() {
215    return pinknoiselevel;
216  }
217}
